Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.title: Invalid file format. Choose the file with the extension ".xlsx".
The file does not match the template. Possible reasons:
Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.text:
• The file does not contain the specifications of the items
• The request has been updated and your proposal is out of date
• The table columns or customer data have been changed
Process.Light.Import.Positions.InvalidFi.download: Download the proposal template and upload it again.
